about_the_game:
The Supermoves Digital Deluxe Edition allows you to stand out from the crowd with a unique set of Deluxe cosmetics, including a holographic hoodie, pants, gloves, sneakers and snapback! Also includes the official Supermoves Original Soundtrack.

The Supermoves Digital Deluxe Edition includes digital extras:

  • The official Supermoves Original Soundtrack

Unique Digital Deluxe Edition Cosmetics:

  • Deluxe Holographic Snapback (Light / Dark)
  • Deluxe Holographic Hoodie (Light / Dark / Cerulean / Crimson)
  • Deluxe Holographic Pants (Light / Dark / Cerulean / Crimson)
  • Deluxe Holographic Gloves
  • Deluxe Holographic Sneakers (Light / Dark / Cerulean / Crimson)
